title: What is the origin of Western civilization and its connections to Eastern civilizations?
first_phrase: This text discusses the origin of Mediterranean civilizations and how the Greek civilization descended from the north. The author also touches upon the complex issue of the origins of Eastern civilizations, such as Chinese and Japanese, and their influence on the West. However, the text argues that the formula "ex Oriente lux" (light from the East) is inaccurate, as the center of origin of civilization is largely in the North and West. The last 200 tokens include several chapters on various topics, such as the esoteric doctrine of secret centers, the magic of ritual, and the symbolisms of agriculture in Roman tradition.
